p: Ethyl 1-((1H-pyrazol-1-yl)methyl)-2-phenylcyclopropane-1-carboxylate (44). Purification using ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (5:9 5 → 1:9) afforded the product as a colourless oil in 58% yield. 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.46 (dd, J = 6.3, 2.0 Hz, 2H), 7.41–7.27 (m, 5H), 6.18 (t, J = 2.1 Hz, 1H), 4.70 (d, J = 14.7 Hz, 1H), 4.31 − 4.11 (m, 2H), 3.43 (d, J = 14.8 Hz, 1H), 2.99 (t, J = 8.4 Hz, 1H), 1.91 − 1.77 (m, 2H), 1.27 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H).
